long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SFDX Metadata Backup Chrome Extension 🚀

Simplify the process of backing up Salesforce metadata components with the SFDX Metadata Backup Chrome Extension. Designed for Salesforce developers, this extension allows you to easily download metadata from your Salesforce org directly through your browser, offering a fast and secure way to back up key Salesforce components.

Key Features:
🔍 Search & Filter Metadata: Quickly find the metadata types you need using powerful search and filtering options.
⚡ Quick Component Selection: Easily select multiple components to download in bulk.
🌓 Theme Support: Switch between dark and light themes to match your preference.
📦 Bulk Metadata Download: Download multiple metadata components in one go, saving you time.
🔒 Secure Authentication: Uses your existing Salesforce session for seamless and secure authentication.
🎯 User-Friendly Interface: A simple, intuitive design ensures an easy experience for developers of all levels.
How It Works:
🌐 Open your Salesforce org in Chrome.
🖱️ Click the extension icon in your browser toolbar to launch the backup interface.
🔎 Search and select the metadata components you want to download.
📥 Click "Download Selected Components" to initiate the backup process.
Supported Metadata Types:
⚙️ Apex Classes
🌟 Lightning Web Components
✨ Aura Components
📄 Visualforce Pages
📑 Custom Objects
🔧 And more...
Security:
🚫 No Credential Storage: Your Salesforce credentials are not stored in the extension.
🔐 HTTPS Communication: All communication between the extension and Salesforce is encrypted for security.
🛡️ Chrome’s Security Sandbox: Operates within Chrome's security environment for added safety.
Browser Compatibility:
🌐 Google Chrome (Version 88+)
🖥️ Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based)
🔄 Other Chromium-based browsers
Perfect for Salesforce developers who need an efficient, secure way to back up metadata directly from their Salesforce org. Try it today! 😎
